title: Tassel
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White linen tassel with pear-shaped base. Core is braided over with linen yarns worked in groups for a basket-weave effect. Tiny braided balls attached around the base and from the bottom hang two tiers of knotted elements: the shorter tier showing clusters of tiny braided balls and the longer tier with larger, more elaborate elements with strings of tiny knotted balls hanging from them.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel.
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-66.
